thread.section_title: Store DJ Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Store DJ | storedj.com.au
thread.title: Kane

author: Kane
title: Kane
text:
I've had mixed experiences with these kinds of stores over the years, but after seeing the store on the way home and dropping in unplanned, was the best experience I've had in at least a decade.
Store was neat, great displays, the salesman was approachable, knowledgeable and told it like it is which I really appreciate. Prices were reasonable (seen some outrageous markups over the years), the advice I was given to problem solve my equipment at home was spot on, and I didn't feel preached to or mislead at all (which happens in most retail businesses). Cheap, friendly, solved my issue, and had a nice human conversation as well...
Ill be back, very impressed.
